metadata.name: Potential Application Whitelisting Bypass via Dnx.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of Dnx.EXE. The Dnx utility allows for the execution of C# code. Attackers might abuse this in order to bypass application whitelisting.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\dnx.exe')))

output.summary: Detects the execution of Dnx.EXE. The Dnx utility allows for the execution of C# code. Attackers might abuse this in order to bypass application whitelisting.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate use of dnx.exe by legitimate user References: https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/OtherMSBinaries/Csi/, https://enigma0x3.net/2016/11/17/bypassing-application-whitelisting-by-using-dnx-exe/
